Worksheet.Table:
<#if JSON.reporttype=="kif">
          Pregled Transakcija izlaznih racuna
        <#else>
          Pregled Transakcija ulaznih racuna
        </#if>
        
      
      

      

        
          Pravno lice
        
      
      

        
          ${JSON.companyname}
        
      
      

        
          ${JSON.companyaddress}
        
      
      

        
          ${JSON.pib}
        
      
      

        
          ${JSON.period}
        
      
      

      

        
          POPDV datum
        
        
          Broj transakcije/dokumenta
        
        
          Tip transakcije/dokumenta
        
        
          Povezani dokument
        
        
          <#if JSON.reporttype=="kif">Naziv kupca<#else>Naziv dobavljaca</#if>
        
        
          <#if JSON.reporttype=="kif">Adresa kupca<#else>Adresa dobavljaca</#if>
        
        
          <#if JSON.reporttype=="kif">PIB kupca<#else>PIB dobavljaca</#if>
        
        
          Broj dokumenta
        
        
          Datum dokumenta
        
        
          Datum prometa
                
        
          Stopa PDV
        
        
          Poreski kod
        
        
          Osnovica za obracun poreza
        
        
          Iznos PDV
        
        
          Ukupna vrednost dokumenta
        
        
          Memo
        
      
      <#list JSON.groups as group>


        
          ${group.desc}
        
      
      <#list group.transactions as tran>
<#if tran.type=="Deposit Application - Primljeni avansi sadržani u konačnoj izlaznoj fakturi">
        <#list tran.invoices as invoice>


          
            ${tran.popdvdatum}
          
          
            ${tran.trannumber}
          
          
            ${tran.type}
          
          
            ${invoice.refnum}
          
          
            ${tran.customer}
          
          
            ${tran.custaddress}
          
          
            ${tran.pib}
          
          
            ${tran.tranid}
          
          
            ${tran.trafficdate}
          
          
            ${tran.trandate}
          
          
            ${tran.rate}
          
          
            ${tran.taxcode}
          
          
            -${invoice.netamount}
          
          
            -${invoice.taxamount}
          
          
            -${invoice.amount}
          
          
            ${tran.memo}
          
        
      </#list>
      <#elseif tran.type=="Vendor Prepayment Application - Dati avansi sadržani u konačnoj izlaznoj fakturi">
        <#list tran.bills as bill>


          
            ${tran.popdvdatum}
          
          
            ${tran.trannumber}
          
          
            ${tran.type}
          
          
            ${bill.refnum}
          
          
            ${tran.customer}
          
          
            ${tran.custaddress}
          
          
            ${tran.pib}
          
          
            ${tran.tranid}
          
          
            ${tran.trafficdate}
          
          
            ${tran.trandate}
          
          
            ${tran.rate}
          
          
            ${tran.taxcode}
          
          
            -${bill.netamount}
          
          
            -${bill.taxamount}
          
          
            -${bill.amount}
          
          
            ${tran.memo}
          
        
      </#list>
      <#else>
        

          
            ${tran.popdvdatum}
          
          
            ${tran.trannumber}
          
          
            ${tran.type}
          
          
            
          
          
            ${tran.customer}
          
          
            ${tran.custaddress}
          
          
            ${tran.pib}
          
          
            ${tran.tranid}
          
          
            ${tran.trafficdate}
          
          
            ${tran.trandate}
          
          
            ${tran.rate}
          
          
            ${tran.taxcode}
          
          
            ${tran.amount}
          
          
            ${tran.taxamount}
          
          
            ${tran.calculatedGrossAmount}
          
          
            ${tran.memo}
          
        
      </#if>
    </#list>
    

      
        
      
      
        
      
      
        
      
      
        
      
      
        
      
      
        
      
      
        
      
      
        
      
      
        
      
      
        
      
      
        
      
      
        
      
      
        ${group.nettotal}
      
      
        ${group.taxtotal}
      
      
        ${group.total}
      
      
        
      
    
  </#list>
  <#if JSON.reporttype=="kif" && JSON.customerDeposits?size>0 >
  

    
       Customer Deposits - Primljeni avansi 
    
  
  </#if>
  <#if JSON.customerDeposits?size>0 >

      <#if JSON.reporttype=="kif">PIB kupca<#else>PIB dobavljaca</#if>

      Osnovica za obracun poreza
    
    
      Iznos PDV
    
    
      Ukupna vrednost dokumenta
    
    
      Memo
    
  
  </#if>
  <#list JSON.customerDeposits as cdGroup>
  

    
      ${cdGroup.desc}
    
  
    <#list cdGroup.transactions as tran>
      

        
          ${tran.popdvdatum}
        
        
          ${tran.trannumber}
        
        
          ${tran.type}
        
        
          
        
        
          ${tran.customer}
        
        
          ${tran.custaddress}
        
        
          ${tran.pib}
        
        
          ${tran.tranid}
        
        
          ${tran.trafficdate}
        
        
          ${tran.trandate}
        
        
          ${tran.rate}
        
        
          ${tran.taxcode}
        
        
          ${tran.amount}
        
        
          ${tran.taxamount}
        
        
          ${tran.calculatedGrossAmount}
        
        
          ${tran.memo}
        
      
    </#list>
    

      
        
      
      
        
      
      
        
      
      
        
      
      
        
      
      
        
      
      
        
      
      
        
      
      
        
      
      
        
      
      
        
      
      
        
      
      
        ${cdGroup.nettotal}

        ${cdGroup.total}
      
      
        
      
    
  </#list>
